posts.post_content:
Looking for a few in the PSA/SGC 3-5 range or the raw equivalent. I am looking for clean examples and could live with a small crease not impacting the main image of the card.  I would really like to avoid paper loss, but a small spot on the back might be ok.  Back stamps are fine, writing is not.

The prices on ebay are just a bit high. Let me know what you have.  You can send front and back scans and prices to [url]rchilders1973@gmail.com[/url]. Thanks! 

Sent from my SM-G900V using Tapatalk
I have found a few.  Anyone else?

Still looking. So far every Obak I have purchased has been slabbed.  Anyone have a few ungraded Obaks in the vgex to ex  range?  Would love to have some I could put  in tobacco sized toploaders in pages in a binder.   No major creasing, writing, or back damage.

Sent from my SM-G900V using Tapatalk

I have all of mine raw and love them that way. If you haven't discovered them yet, check out Ultra Pro's mini 9 pocket pages.  The pockets are slightly narrower and they hold tobacco top loaders perfectly.

Conor, I think I have a couple of the pages you are referring to.  I put the card in the tobacco sized toploader and into the pocket in the page.  If I can get enough ungraded ones that I can live with, that's my plan.  I honestly think I would prefer that.

Sent from my SM-G900V using Tapatalk
Looking to pick up a couple in decent VG or VGEX shape.  Anyone have any to sell?  Email me at [url]rchilders1973@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks.
